verbose_text: As shown in XREF_FIG, in HFD treated rats, arnebin-1 treatment increased IRS-1 phosphorylation at Tyr608, Akt phosphorylation at Ser473 and mTOR phosphorylation at Ser2448 and inhibited IRS-1 phosphorylation at Ser307 in the presence of an insulin injection.
evidence:
arnebin-1
treatment increased IRS-1 phosphorylation at Tyr608, Akt phosphorylation at Ser473
and mTOR phosphorylation at Ser2448
